h1_38: University of Louisville School of Medicine Program
h3_39: University of Louisville School of Medicine
span_48: University of Louisville School of Medicine
p_63: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).
h3_67: # of Filled Resident Positions, by Year*
p_78: *Totals may vary from year to year due to off-cycle residents.
th_96: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_99: Our residency program provides diverse and broad training in general and medical dermatology, dermatopathology, surgery, and cosmetics. Our residents treat patients in a variety of clinics, including the VA, private practice, and the university clinic. Furthermore, they have opportunities for autonomy and longitudinal care through continuity clinics during residency. We also provide support for meeting attendance, a dermatoscope, and books.

p_345: The race/ethnicity data are shown alone or in combination with other race/ethnicity responses. Because some individuals may report multiple races/ethnicities, the totals may not equal 100%. Only residents who are U.S. citizens or permanent residents are included in race/ethnicity counts.
